item.title: Desiderata काङ्क्षा
item.description: Desiderata (cross-national) We are in favor of the following (subject to change): A strong revival of paganism (potentially bound by the meta-template of hinduism) as an alternative to the Abrahamic religions. Protection of individual freedom to the maximum possible extant. Freedom of speech and its limits - see here. Marijuana should be legalized and regulated - just like alcohol, tobacco, red bull and coffee. Marijuana is less harmful than alcohol.
